sentences: Gisèle Barreau was born in Couëron, west of Nantes in Brittany, and studied with Émile Leipp and Michèle Castellengo for musical acoustics at Jussieu University.
In 1977 she received a diploma in electroacoustic music from the Groupe de Recherches Musicales (GRM).
She was composer-in-residence at the MacDowell Colony in 1978 and resident at the Villa Medici from 1980-82.
Composition Prize of the SACEM Georges Enescu (1978)
